Practice School Internship - Grasim Industries , India


This project was my work at Grasim Industries, Nagda, India. One of the biggest industries in India. Which gave me good industrial worklife and management experience and skills.


Project aim:

In this project I researched water samples and worked on, finding ways to purify the water being used in industries using better machinery and methodology.
